title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message:
Macbook Pro Retina Mid 2014 13" A1502 model. Came in for a cracked lcd. Replaced the full panel. Now, the wi-fi is stuck on searching Wi-Fi but has been connected to the internet...
Any help is appreciated..

title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message: Bad Wifi cable I guess. Check the connectors, I bet one was ripped off and fucked up.

title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message: Hi dukefawks, no I forgot to mention the WiFi bar was still searching even when connected to wi-fi. No prior repairs. Changed the whole assembly with a Grade A(LOL), can't get a new assembly for god sake..I asked the customer when did he start having that issue. He can't remember. No torn cables, no pads ripped. Has macOS Sierra on it.

title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message: Well, either try another airport card or another LCD assembly, there is nothing more to this.

title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message: Wait, it actually connects successfully to a network and works? Could be software then, boot from USB drive with 10.11. At least 10.11 has had the bugs fixed.

title: Constant Wi-fi search even when connected to the Wi-Fi..
message: Yes, just bar keeps on searching while actually I can access the net no problem...
